summary:
### 📌 Disease:
📌  Durian Leaf Blight

### 💥 Cause:
- 💥  Caused by the fungus Cadophora gossypina. Spread primarily through infected plants, infected plant material, and contaminated tools.


### 😷 Symptoms:
- 😷  Dark brown to black lesions on leaves, leaf drop, and eventually defoliation. Infected leaves may also exhibit yellowish spots.


### 💊 Treatment & Prevention:
- 💊  Fungicides can help in treatment. Use resistant varieties if possible. Good sanitation, including cleaning tools and avoiding contact between healthy and infected plants, can prevent spread. Proper irrigation and avoiding overcrowding may also help reduce infection.
